name: redux-saga-monitor
description: Dispatch monitoring events for redux saga

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.compile: rimraf lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel -d lib/ src/
scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-saga-monitor.js --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-saga-monitor.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: rimraf dist es && npm run build:umd:dev && npm run build:umd:prod && npm run build:es
scripts.prepublish: npm run check && npm run compile && npm run build
